name: PK-5th Grade Programs
description: The CCSC PK-5 Tutoring program is a student-led program aimed to aid bilingual immigrant children in learning English through the SF Chinatown Charity Cultural Services Center (CCSC). Through weekly virtual tutoring twice a week in English as well as special weekend events, the PK-5 Tutoring Program aims to give students the tools to succeed both inside and outside of the classroom by strengthening their language confidence and providing mentorship.
